title: Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187 - Localization key cannot be blank when adding.

Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1.
OB: Add a new localization key with no value provided.
EB:
In the properties file, leave the key blank, but provide a valid value.

Expected result: The externalized text should be able to be displayed in the chart title.

Actual result: The externalized text cannot be displayed.
SR: The application should not allow for the creation of a localization key with no value. The user should be prompted to provide a valid value for the key.
